name: Ethio Picture Quiz
description:
Ethio Picture Quiz : Amharic Mobile Game

Play this Amazing Picture Quiz Game have fun and Learn things.

there are many offline levels to play.

and there are also Online Levels you can play more categories will be Added

★ More than pictures to play

★ High-quality graphics.

★ Pictures Arranged Well

★ Amharic and English 

★ Uses hints and clues in difficult levels

★ Recognize and guess,

★ Answer more pictures to unlock new levels and buy online categories

★ Ask your Facebook or telegram friends for help when you’re stuck on a Picture you don't know !

★ Great Pictures, word, and trivia game for the whole family!

★ Fun Picture, trivia, and word quiz to stimulate your brain and help with memory!

★ Ethiopian and African Focused Game

★ Amharic alphabet

★ Amharic Fidel
